note:
Crazy cat lady, Mom, Grandma, background in broadcasting, software dev, loves to write, loves to tinker. I run a busy household in a huge old Victorian house somewhere around Buffalo, NY.

Got into this federated social media thing because of Net Neutrality and the fact that we have a crazy person running this country at the moment and we are a diverse family just trying to survive in this insanity. Also, facebook and twitter are poison.
